Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Outflow valve control malfunction. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 26/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
